channel.title: Help with connection abort: socket wrtie error
channel.description:
Ok I have Vipscape and I have been able to login to it for around 5hours without any lagg or problems. I complied NO ERRORS ran NO ERRORS then when I log in invent comes up then I dc I looked in run.bat and it says
[code][client-1-Marc323909]Loading process complete [Has powers, lag :16ms Software caused connection abort: socket write error Client lost connection: timeout [client-1-Marc323909] Logout[/code]
Whats the
[code]Software caused connection abort: socket write error[/code]
**EDIT** My dads just looking to by stuff down stairs hes not downloading anything and xbox360 is turned off
**EDIT** I also get the same problem when I unforward my ports -.- this is annoying[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 09, 2008, 02:11:33 PM[/size][hr]Please help????

item.title: Help with connection abort: socket wrtie error
item.dc:creator: @Marc323909 Marc323909
item.description:
@Marc323909 wrote:

Ok I have Vipscape and I have been able to login to it for around 5hours without any lagg or problems. I complied NO ERRORS ran NO ERRORS then when I log in invent comes up then I dc I looked in run.bat and it says

[client-1-Marc323909]Loading process complete [Has powers, lag :16ms Software caused connection abort: socket write error Client lost connection: timeout [client-1-Marc323909] Logout

and xbox360 is turned off
